titleStmt.title: The Art of catechising, or, The compleat catechist in four parts ...

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.L. for Henry Bonwicke ...,

notesStmt.note: "Imprimatur. Feb. 4, 1690/1. Z. Isham, R.P.D. Henrico Episc. Lond. à sacris"
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.

(from t.p.) I. The church-catechism resolved into easie questions, to be answered only by yes or no -- II. An exposition of it in a continued, full, and plain discourse -- III. The church-catechism resolved into Scripture-proofs -- IV. The whole duty of man reduced into questions, to be answered by a single yes or no.
